markdownRemark.html:
Approximately a month ago my book OpenLayers Cookbook was released by PacktPublishing and today I found it is available at many sites of debatable reputation.

Really I'm surprising by the velocity of this alternative publication process :)

Honestly, I hope all these sites have many downloads, that means the book is interesting for many people.

Hopefully, for all of you that are contrary to piracy the book continues available at legal sites ready to be bought for a few dollars

frontmatter.title: OpenLayers Cookbook pirated... but you can continue buying it !!!
